ComicInfo.Summary:
DAY FIVE: With the world going to hell in a hand basket a new hero emerges to help with the growing chaos. But heroes can't stop people from leaving their jobs, posts at the border and choosing to spend time with their families instead. The world is ending after all, and how are you going to spend it?
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | -------------------------------------------------------------- Reg | Regular Cover | Stjepan Šejić | 1 | Var | Virgin Variant Cover | Stjepan Šejić | 2 |
